section.p: As Taglets extend the Javadoc engine, it's a requirement that the Javadoc engine must be extended to include the Taglets. To run correctly; the Taglets have to be able to locate the configuration XML, this is done by setting a Java System Property. Depending on how the configuration XML file is configured, will influence on how the tags are rendered or included. It is also important to include the supplied css (Docfacto7.css or Docfacto6.css) so that the Taglets can be rendered correctly. As JavaDoc has changed at java7, users running java7 and above should use the Docfacto7.css elsewise pre java7 should use Docfacto6.css
